```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(stringr)
```

In the following all different warning and error messages raised during the studies are listed (see Table 1) and shown how often they occurred under various fitting conditions (see Table 2).

```{r}
df <- readRDS("../simulation/results/simulation_results_study1.rda")
detailed_results <- df$DetailedResults

```

```{r}
unique_warnings <- unique(detailed_results$Warnings)
unique_errors <- unique(detailed_results$Errors)

unique_warnings <- unique_warnings[unique_warnings != ""]
unique_errors <- na.omit(unique_errors)

combined_list <- tibble(
  ID = seq_along(c(unique_warnings, unique_errors)),
  Message = c(unique_warnings, unique_errors)
)

combined_list <- combined_list %>%
  mutate(Message = str_wrap(Message, width = 80))

# mapping warnings and errors to IDs
id_map <- setNames(combined_list$ID, c(unique_warnings, unique_errors))

combined_list %>%
  kable("latex", booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE, 
        caption = "List of Unique Warnings and Errors",
        align = c('c', 'l')) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header", "hold_position"),
                full_width = TRUE,
                font_size = 10,
                position = "left") %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "1cm") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "14cm") %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, align = "c") %>%
  footnote(general = "This table lists all unique warnings and errors encountered during the simulation study.",
           general_title = "Note.",
           threeparttable = TRUE,
           escape = FALSE,
           footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)

```

```{r}
combined_summary <- detailed_results %>%
  mutate(MessageID = ifelse(!is.na(Warnings), id_map[Warnings], id_map[Errors])) %>%
  filter(!is.na(MessageID)) %>%
  mutate(
    method = case_when(
      str_detect(method, "lSAM_ULS") ~ "lSAM-ULS",
      TRUE ~ method
    )
  ) %>%
  group_by(model_type, N, reliability, method, MessageID) %>%
  summarise(count = n(), .groups = 'drop') %>%
  arrange(desc(count)) %>%
  rename(
    `Model Type` = model_type,
    `Message ID` = MessageID,
    `Reliability` = reliability,
    `Method` = method,
    `Count` = count
  )


combined_summary %>%
  kable("latex", booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE, 
        caption = "Summary of Warnings and Errors by Condition with ID",
        align = c('c', 'c', 'c', 'c', 'c', 'c')) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header", "hold_position"), 
                full_width = FALSE, 
                font_size = 10,
                position = "left") %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "2.5cm") %>%  # Model Type
  column_spec(2, width = "1cm") %>%    # N
  column_spec(3, width = "2cm") %>%    # reliability
  column_spec(4, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # method
  column_spec(5, width = "2.5cm") %>%  # Message ID
  column_spec(6, width = "1.5cm") %>%  # count
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, align = "c") %>%
  kableExtra::footnote(general = "This table summarizes the count of warnings and errors for each condition in simulation study 1 with the respective ID number corresponding to table 1.",
                       general_title = "Note.",
                       threeparttable = TRUE,
                       escape = FALSE,
                       footnote_as_chunk = TRUE)
```
